layout.singingstanza: Ear -- ly in the morn -- ing, Meet -- ing with the saints, Gath -- er the fresh man -- na, Take in His rich grace! Christ in all the saints, Liv -- ing, fresh and new. Blend -- ing with each oth -- er, Tast -- ing morn -- ing dew!

lyrics.stanza: Early in the morning, Meeting with the saints, Gather the fresh manna, Take in His rich grace!
Christ in all the saints, Living, fresh and new. Blending with each other, Tasting morning dew!
Singing songs together, Spirits exercised. Drawing from each other, Christ is realized!
Reading in the Bible, Each one taking turns; Fellowship together, How our spirit burns!
Praying for our loved ones, Bring them to the throne. Christ desires to save them, Bringing them all home!
Morning, noon and evening, Gath'ring with the saints; Joy in each one's presence, Taking in fresh grace.
